text: <!here|@here> no sputnik time is avp, right?
meta is one thing but i mean how about the Retro?

Not to my knowledge and not my domain/decision, but I think there could be a good argument for awarding a block of AVP hrs. Upon delivery/completing the workshop. Or it could be an interesting thing where your peers are able to assign you (within a range) AVP hrs. As a review mechanism? Something like that.
As a heads up, I'll may be a minute late to retro, waiting for a sammich from water ace
It was discussed ahead that AVP would not be received for the sprint. But we can discuss further after reading your retro.

Yeah. I also mentioned in the retro that completing the Sputnik sprint could also open up the adjacent possible of AVP opportunities (e.g. Finish the design of the box and the items inside, building out a prototype of the buddy bench, etc.)
Thanks everyone for this project coming to life, i really hope this has a life after!!
yeah, i would very cleanly separate AVP from Sputnik activities, as they are competing versions of employee investment. we double them up, the wagon tips.
wagon tips …reminded me of oregon trail and how fording the river was so risky
thank goodness we don’t worry about dysentery.
